attributes.action: Give tax rebates and community charge rebates to taxpayers due to the missuse of MP's expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is it one rule for us and another for the government?
If members of the general public gained financially through lies, deceit, greed and fraud they would be facing criminal proceedings. 
Forget the MP's favorite quote- 
'It's in the rules'. 
They made the rules to allow missuse of the system, in simple terms FRAUD!
Don't be fobbed off with the fact that the MP's involved are now paying back these misclaimed expenses, if the expenses scandal had not hit the national press the MP's involved wouldn't have payed a penny back.  
Sign this petition NOW!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
